title: Need Help this is frustrating
body:
Ok this new client is giving a ton of probs. great game but it doesn't work well. 

1) in game my MS is 73 can spike to nearly 5000 with even my MS not showin the proper MS amount. so my internet isn't the prob. haven nothing in background running just league. 

2) when my MS is 73-75 which is normal I still seem to have a delay of 2 secs while using abilities movement and so on.

3) my trouble shooting is lowered graphics but still a pain in the arse. PLZ HELP

BRING BACK LEGACY....

replies.body:
This doesn't have anything to do with the updated client, as your ping is a direct correlation of how quickly your network is able to get responses from the server it's pinging. 

When you mentioned those crazy spikes to 5000 ms and seeing 2-second delays actually sounds a lot like packet loss, which basically means that your connection is getting corrupted along its route to our servers. Typically the main issue lies with your ISP when this happens, but let's go ahead and take a look at how your connection is doing after it leaves your network using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let that tool scan some network logs from a game that had this heavy ping spike, and post a screenshot of what it says here!
